Welcome to Scenarioo!


You can change this welcome message and all other settings of Scenarioo on t he configuration page.

Please put your application specific welcome message to your user's of Scena rioo here. This is the place where you might want to explain the appication spec ific structure of your Scenarioo documentation, such that new user's of this too l will quickly find their way through your user scenarios of your application.

To start exploring the features of Scenarioo, simply choose one of the examp le use cases and then one of its secenarios to browse step by step through the p ages and screenshots of one tested user scenario.

Have fun!
